name: Dracodoodle
printed_effect:
You can Expend {wind} in order to Suppress each
Elestral on an opponent's field until the
End Phase. When this Dracodoodle destroys an
opponent's Suppressed Elestral in battle that
opponent must Expend {omni}{omni}{omni}.
effect: You can Expend {wind} in order to Suppress each Elestral on an opponent's field. When this Dracodoodle destroys an opponent's Suppressed Elestral that opponent must Expend {omni}{omni}{omni}.
